short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool is intended to prepopulate customer tasks/learning items when they are browsing favorite sites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A convinient tool for MagicYou.Me users to add task from coursera, Linkedin Learning, MIT OCW, Stanford Online and Upwork.
